greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Card{ (x,y,z) | x < y < z and lcm(x,y,z) = n}.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: for n from 1 to 100 do a[n] := 0:for x from 1 to n do for y from x+1 to n do for z from y+1 to n do if(lcm(x,y,z)=n) then a[n] := a[n]+1:fi:od:od:od:od:seq(a[j],j=1..200); # _Sascha Kurz_, Sep 22 2003
program: A086165(n) = ((A070919(n)-3*A048691(n)+2)/6); \\ _Antti Karttunen_, May 19 2017, after Jovovic's formula
results.author: Yuval Dekel (dekelyuval(AT)hotmail.com), Sep 13 2003
